title: Decision Tree Extraction for Clinical Decision Support System with If-Else Pseudocode and PlanSelect Strategy

abstract: Decision trees, as a structured representation of medical knowledge, are critical resources for building clinical decision support systems. Their structured decision pathways can be used for retrieval to enhance clinical decision making. Currently …
